title: Grandma's Hearthside Bakery
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed comic book illustration of a cheerful, smiling grandmother kneading bread dough on a rustic wooden table in a cozy, sunlit bakery kitchen, 9:16 aspect ratio. The grandmother wears a white apron over a red polka dot dress. The kitchen features a large stone fireplace with a glowing fire, hanging copper pots, and shelves stocked with jars and ingredients. A large arched window casts warm natural light. Two sleeping orange tabby cats rest on a rug near the hearth. A sign reading 'GRANDMA'S BAKERY' hangs above the window. The scene has a warm atmosphere and detailed line art, traditional comic book coloring, thick black outlines.
